name: The Slow Mo World
description:
How high can you get?

Perpetually jumping from one platform to the next, you can do slow motion and you need to avoiding the death.  This game is made in C# using the Unity engine! 

Controls
  • Arrows - Move
  • C - Slow Motion
Credits / About

This game was made in 1-2 weeks for a school project.
Theme: Platformer
Art Assets:  From internet
Sound effects: From internet
